item.title: Now
item.description:
What is a now page? Read more about them here.

Update: December 23, 2025

I started working remotely with the GC.OS team on a project involvong OpenML and AIoD. I will work for the next 2-3 months and then focus back on my university.

I am reading The Road by Cormac McCarthy these days.

item.title: Beyond the Scorecard: Decoding Team Strategies in IPL 2025 Using Data Science
item.description:
Final, Final_1, Final_2, Final_3, …, Final_N?

A journey to understand the tournament's stats using data science concepts

When I was in middle school and I did not know how to code websites, I used to use tools like Wordpress and PortfolioBox. They always left me dissatisfied because of how clunky and bloated they felt. But using them made me form my own philosophy around website designs - I ended up knowing what I don’t like and it is very important to know what you don’t like!

item.title: From Raw Data to Actionable Insights: My 3-Day Deep Dive into Data Science Salaries
item.description: If you’want to learn more about salaries of data science along with experience levels and job location go must checkout and see how I analysed it.
